Text: Hanna Varis:  She participated in the NUROPE, Nomadic University for Art, Philosophy and Enterprise in Europe, in 2006-2010.

Text: Hanna Varis:  Her works are part of major art collections in Finland and abroad, such as the Kiasma, Amos Anderson Art Museum, and Helsinki Art Museum in Helsinki, Wäinö Aaltonen Museum of Art in Turku, and Albertina Museum in Vienna.
